query: Can you assist in developing a 3-day trip plan for two individuals? We'll embark on our journey from San Jose aiming to explore Portland from March 16th to March 18th, 2022. Our budget is limited to $1,000. Our itinerary must include accommodations where pets are allowed. Regarding cuisine, we're particularly interested in Mediterranean, French, Mexican, and Indian food. Importantly, please avoid any flight bookings for transportation.
